title: Ranked shielding
body: So I read that you do get a shield after being promoted, 3 for division and 10 for moving up a tier. I just moved up a tier I was jw is there a physical way to see that the shield is on? Just would like to be assured that it is

replies.body:
Unfortunately, there's no way to check if you're under demotion protection. I'd recommend counting the number of games you've played in your new division or Tier. Check out our [Ranked Play FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ) for more details on the ranked system.

Let me know if you have any questions.
